ValidationRule.description: Required fields for Coupon and Swag are Reason, Swag Item, Coupon Number, Brand, and Subject
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Type ,'Coupon and Swag'), OR( ISBLANK( Text(Reason__c )), ISBLANK( Coupon_Tracking_Number__c ), ISBLANK( Text(Reason__c )), ISBLANK(Brand__c), ISBLANK(Quantity__c), ISBLANK( Shipping_Address_Line_1__c ), ISBLANK( Shipping_Address_City__c ), ISBLANK( Text (Shipping_Address_State_Province__c )), ISBLANK( Shipping_Address_ZIP_Postal_Code__c ), ISBLANK( Text (Shipping_Address_Country__c )), ISBLANK(Consumer_Phone__c), ISBLANK( Subject )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reason, Swag Item, Coupon Tracking #, Brand,Subject, Quantity, and Shipping Info are required when Primary Case Type is "Coupon and Swag"
